Instructions: A fixation point will appear at the center of the display. While maintaining fixation, pay attention to the images that flash on screen. Make note of an image when it repeats back to back.
TaskDescription: A category localizer used to define face, place, and body areas. This contains the same images as Category Localizer 1 but in a different presentation order. Images of faces, places, bodies, and scrambled images will flash onscreen, occasionally repeating.
